chapter.title: Resolved Issues
chapter.para: To view information about issues resolved in this release of JBoss Developer Studio, see on the JBoss issue tracking system and enter the following search query as one line: (project in (JBIDE) AND affectedVersion in ("4.1.0.Final") AND fixVersion = "4.1.0.1.Final" OR project in (JBDS) AND affectedVersion in ("7.0.0.GA") AND fixVersion = "7.0.1.GA") AND type in (Bug) AND resolution in (Done)
